intro:
Hello player, welcome to Star Wars Adventure!
You are a young farmer living on Tatooine, but you have received a message that you have the abilities to become a Jedi, and the first step is to find Jedi Master Yoda on the planet Dagobah. 
Good luck and may the force be with you!

directions.name: Tatooine
directions.description: Tatooine is a desert planet isolated from the galaxy

items.itemDescription: Use these keys to fly your spaceship across planets

directions.name: Jabba's Cave
directions.description: You are in Jabba The Hutt's cave, he is a crime lord who rules over the planet Tatooine

directions.name: Alderaan
directions.description: You are at Alderaan. You hear this planet is in danger of being destroyed by the Empire
